oop.tema3.engine

Class BorderedStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.tema3.engine.BorderedStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BorderStrategyInterface

    public class BorderedStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements BorderStrategyInterface
    Author:
    Botarleanu Robert-Mihai 321CB A Bordered strategy class for analyzing cells on the edges of the array. This class will determine if a cell on a given location on the border survives into the next generation. Uses a bordered approach, any cell outside of the array is considered dead.

                    Cell[][] nextGeneration,
                    int i,
                    int j)
        Specified by:
        resolveCollision in interface BorderStrategyInterface
        Parameters:
        cells - cells the array of Cells that exist in the game.
        nextGeneration - array off Cell units that describes the layout in the next generation
        i - the line in the array of the cell to be analyzed
        j - the column in the array of the cell to be analyzed

      • checkSurvival

        private void checkSurvival(Cell[][] cells,
                 Cell[][] nextGeneration,
                 int i,
                 int j,
                 int nrNeighbours)
        Determines wether a Cell survives in the next generation.
        Parameters:
        cells - the array of Cells that exist in the game.
        nextGeneration - the array of cells in the next generation
        i - line position of a cell
        j - column position of a cell
        nrNeighbours - number of alive neighbours a cell has.

        Determines the number of alive neighbours a Cell has on the previous column. This is used for the last column.
        Parameters:
        cells - the array of Cells that exist in the game.
        i - line position of a Cell in the array.
        j - column position of a Cell in the array.
